message:
Hello {{ interviewer }},

You have been assigned as an interviewer for the following job opening:

  • Position: {{ doc.designation }}
  • Number of Positions: {{ doc.custom_no_of_position }}
  • Company: {{ doc.company }}

Your responsibility is to conduct the interviews associated with this job opening.

Thank you,
HR Team
name: Notify Job Opening Interviewers
subject: You Are Assigned as Interviewer for Job Opening - {{ doc.name }}
